About Atlas Games

We are a passionate indie game studio dedicated to creating immersive experiences that stand the test of time.

Our Story

Atlas Games was born from a simple belief: games should be more than entertainment‚Äîthey should be lasting experiences that bring people together and create memories that endure.

Founded in 2024 by Alex Chen and Maya Rodriguez, our studio emerged from years of industry experience and a shared frustration with the throwaway culture of modern gaming. We wanted to create something different‚Äîgames that players would return to years later, still finding joy and discovery.

Starting with just two people and a dream, we've grown into a diverse team of passionate creators, each bringing unique perspectives and skills to our shared mission of crafting games built to endure.

Our Mission & Values

üéØ

Quality First

We believe in shipping polished, complete experiences rather than rushing to market. Every game undergoes extensive testing and refinement.

ü§ù

Community Driven

Our players are partners in development. We actively listen to feedback and involve our community in shaping the future of our games.

‚ôªÔ∏è

Sustainable Development

We focus on creating games with longevity, supported by ongoing updates and content that keeps experiences fresh and engaging.

üåç

Inclusive Gaming

Games should be for everyone. We prioritize accessibility, diverse representation, and creating welcoming experiences for all players.

üöÄ

Innovation

While respecting gaming traditions, we're not afraid to experiment and push boundaries to create unique, memorable experiences.

üîç

Transparency

We believe in open development. Regular updates, honest communication, and behind-the-scenes insights keep our community informed.

Our Development Process

From Concept to Launch

  1. Ideation: Every game starts with a core question: "What experience do we want to create?"
  2. Prototyping: We build playable prototypes early to test core mechanics and gather feedback.
  3. Community Input: Alpha and beta testing with our Discord community shapes development direction.
  4. Iterative Development: Regular cycles of building, testing, and refining based on player feedback.
  5. Polish Phase: Extensive QA, accessibility testing, and final optimizations before launch.
  6. Post-Launch Support: Ongoing updates, bug fixes, and content expansions based on player needs.

Tools & Technology

Unity Engine

Our primary development platform for cross-platform game creation.

Blender

3D modeling, animation, and rendering for our game assets.

Adobe Creative Suite

Digital art creation, UI design, and asset optimization.

Git & GitHub

Version control and collaborative development workflows.
